questions:
What is depicted in the photo?
A) A mural on a wall
B) Chalk drawing on the ground
C) Graffiti on a building
D) A painting on a canvas

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A chalk drawing and text
B) A person
C) A tree
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A chalk drawing of a sun with a text
C) A person
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees
B) Buildings
C) Grass
D) A cracked concrete surface

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person
B) A chalk drawing and text
C) A playground
D) A tree

What does the chalk drawing depict?
A) A house
B) A sun with rays
C) A tree
D) A person

What is written on the ground in the photo?
A) A name
B) A phrase
C) A date
D) A location

What phrase is written on the ground?
A) "Hello"
B) "Goodbye"
C) "Oh Well"
D) "Welcome

What is the texture of the surface in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and cracked
C) Wet
D) Polished

What kind of surface is the chalk drawing on?
A) Concrete
B) Asphalt
C) Grass
D) Wooden

What color is the surface in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Greenish gray
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the condition of the surface in the photo?
A) New and clean
B) Old and cracked
C) Wet and muddy
D) Covered with leaves

What is the shape of the sun in the chalk drawing?
A) Square
B) Circular
C) Triangular
D) Oval

How many rays are drawn around the sun?
A) 4
B) 6
C) 8
D) 10

What is the pattern inside the sun drawing?
A) Stripes
B) Dots
C) Grid
D) Waves

How is the phrase "Oh Well" written?
A) In block letters
B) In cursive
C) In capital letters
D) In a mix of upper and lower case

What is the orientation of the phrase "Oh Well"?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Curved

What is the condition of the chalk drawing?
A) Fresh and clear
B) Faded and smudged
C) Partially erased
D) Wet and smeared

What artistic technique is used in the chalk drawing?
A) Shading
B) Cross-hatching
C) Pointillism
D) Stippling

How does the texture of the surface affect the chalk drawing?
A) Makes it smoother
B) Adds depth
C) Causes uneven lines
D) Enhances color

How does the color of the surface contrast with the chalk drawing?
A) It blends in
B) It stands out
C) It clashes
D) It complements

What element of the photo is most likely to catch the viewer's attention first?
A) The crack
B) The sun drawing
C) The phrase "Oh Well"
D) The leaves

How does the background contribute to the overall composition of the photo?
A) It distracts from the main focus
B) It enhances the main focus
C) It blends into the main focus
D) It contrasts with the main focus

What is the primary color used in the chalk drawing?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Yellow

What could be a possible title for this photo?
A) "Resilience"
B) "Temporary Art"
C) "Oh Well"
D) "Cracked Creativity

What is the shape of the drawing in the center?
A) A circle with lines
B) A square
C) A triangle
D) A star

How many cracks are visible on the surface?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Three
